-  IntentParameter.Duration 

Enumeration# IntentParameter.Duration

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
enum Duration
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `Measurement<UnitDuration>`.## [Topics](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/duration#topics)
